C

changeLanguage() - Method in class QCSController1
Changes the application's language between English ("en") and French ("fr").
changeLanguageItem - Variable in class QCSController1
`JMenuItem` for changing the application's language.
changeLookAndFeel() - Method in class QCSController1
Allows the user to change the Look and Feel (L&F) of the Swing application.
changeLookFeelItem - Variable in class QCSController1
`JMenuItem` for changing the application's look and feel.
circuitConfiguration - Variable in class QCSController1
A 2D array of strings storing the configuration of gates placed on the circuit.
circuitGrid - Variable in class QCSController1
A 2D array of `JButton` objects representing the grid of quantum gates in the circuit.
createBottomPanel() - Method in class QCSController1
Creates the bottom panel of the application, which includes control options, a tensor product display, and a scrollable message area.
createMainPanels() - Method in class QCSController1
Creates and arranges the main panels of the application: - A header panel with a logo.
createMenuBar() - Method in class QCSController1
Creates the menu bar for the application, including File, Settings, and Help menus.
createQuantumCircuitPanel() - Method in class QCSController1
Creates and initializes the quantum circuit panel, which displays the grid of quantum gates.
createQuantumGatesPanel() - Method in class QCSController1
Creates the panel containing buttons for various quantum gates, categorized into Single Qubit, Multi Qubit, Operations, and Phase Parameters.
currentLocale - Variable in class QCSController1
The current `Locale` used for internationalization.
currentStep - Variable in class QCSController1
Tracks the current step in the circuit execution when in play mode.
